p: For this report, the case-based JE surveillance data reported between January 2005 and December 2017 were analyzed. Demographic and clinical characteristics were presented in frequencies and proportion. Trends in incidence rates were presented in linear graphical form. In line with the current national JE surveillance guideline, case numbers were counted by date of onset and incidences – expressed as the number of cases per 100 000 population – and compared with population denominators provided by China’s National Bureau of Statistics. The spatial distribution was presented using MapInfo 15.0 (Pitney Bowes, Connecticut, US).
